title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
EB: The Most Recently Used (MRU) file list in the File menu is not persisted between sessions. The list does not display any files from the previous session.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Start the workbench. 
2. Open 2 or 3 files. 
3. Shutdown the workbench. 
4. Restart the workbench.
